question: What is my current data balance?
answer: Aapka current data balance {balance_mb} MB hai. Yeh aapke {plan_name} plan ka part hai.

question: Which plan am I currently on?
answer: Aap abhi {plan_name} plan pe ho, jo {price} rupees ka hai aur isme {data_gb} GB data milta hai {validity_days} days ke liye.

question: How do I recharge my number?
answer: Aap apna recharge karne ke liye mobile app use kar sakte ho, ya fir nearest retailer pe ja sakte ho. Online payment options bhi available hain.

question: What are the available recharge plans?
answer: Hamare paas multiple plans available hain: 200 rupees mein basic plan (1.5GB daily), 500 rupees mein smart plan (2GB daily), aur 1000 rupees mein premium plan (3GB daily unlimited calls ke saath).

question: My internet is very slow
answer: Network slow hone ki issue ke liye, pehle apna device restart karein. Agar problem continue ho toh airplane mode on/off karein. Phir bhi issue rahe toh hamare customer care ko call karein.

question: What is the customer care number?
answer: Customer care number hai 1800-XXX-XXXX (toll-free). Aap unhe 24x7 call kar sakte hain for any assistance.

question: Are there any current offers?
answer: Haan ji, abhi 20% cashback offer chal raha hai 500+ recharge pe. Aur new users ke liye welcome bonus bhi hai.

question: When does my plan expire?
answer: Aapka plan validity {validity_days} days ki hai. Expiry date exact jaanne ke liye apne last recharge date se count karein.

question: Can I change my plan mid-cycle?
answer: Haan ji, aap apna plan change kar sakte ho mid-cycle mein. Naya plan activate hone ke baad purana plan replace ho jayega.

question: Why am I getting charged extra?
answer: Extra charges usually tab aate hain jab aap data limit exceed kar dete ho ya out-of-pack services use karte ho. Detailed bill check karne ke liye app mein dekho.

question: How to activate international roaming?
answer: International roaming activate karne ke liye customer care ko call karein ya app se activate kar sakte ho. Special roaming packs bhi available hain.

question: What happens when data finishes?
answer: Jab data khatam ho jata hai, toh internet speed slow ho jati hai ya service stop ho jati hai plan ke type pe depend karta hai. Aapko top-up pack lena padega.

question: Do you have unlimited calling plans?
answer: Haan ji, hamare premium plans mein unlimited calling milti hai sabhi networks pe. 500 rupees aur uske upar ke plans mein yeh included hai.

question: How to check my transaction history?
answer: Transaction history dekhne ke liye mobile app mein 'My Account' section mein jao. Wahan aapko saare recent recharges aur transactions dikhenge.

question: Is there a family plan available?
answer: Currently family plan directly available nahi hai, lekin multiple connections pe discount mil sakta hai. Customer care se contact karein for details.

question: How to port my number to another operator?
answer: Number porting ke liye SMS bhejo 'PORT <10-digit mobile number>' ko 1900 pe. UPC code milega jo new operator ko dena hoga.

question: What is validity of my current balance?
answer: Balance validity aapke plan ke saath linked hai. Jab tak plan active hai tab tak balance use kar sakte ho.

question: Can I get a refund for unused data?
answer: Unused data ka refund generally nahi milta hai. Lekin plan ke saath agar rollover feature ho toh next cycle mein carry forward ho sakta hai.

question: Why is call quality poor?
answer: Call quality poor hone ki wajah network coverage ho sakti hai. Apne area mein signal strength check karein. Agar consistent problem hai toh customer care ko inform karein.

question: How to activate missed call alert?
answer: Missed call alert usually by default active hota hai. Agar nahi hai toh customer care ko call karke activate karwa sakte ho. SMS alerts bhi available hain.

question: What is the cheapest plan available?
answer: Sabse sasta plan 200 rupees ka hai jisme 1.5GB daily data milta hai 28 days ke liye. Yeh basic calling ke saath aata hai.

question: How much data do I have left?
answer: Aapka current data balance {balance_mb} MB remaining hai. Yeh {plan_name} plan ke under hai.

question: Can I transfer balance to another number?
answer: Balance transfer facility available hai selected plans mein. Dial *141# for balance transfer options and follow instructions.

question: Why is my SIM not working?
answer: SIM not working ke multiple reasons ho sakte hain: expired plan, damaged SIM, network issue. Pehle restart karein, fir customer care se contact karein.

question: How to block spam calls?
answer: Spam calls block karne ke liye DND (Do Not Disturb) service activate karein. SMS bhejo START DND to 1909. 7 days mein activate ho jayega.

question: What is the process for new SIM?
answer: Naya SIM lene ke liye nearest store pe jao with original ID proof aur address proof. Verification ke baad same day activation ho jata hai.

question: Are there any student discounts?
answer: Student discounts seasonal offers ke time available hote hain. Current offers check karne ke liye app dekho ya customer care se puchho.

question: How to deactivate my number permanently?
answer: Number permanently deactivate karne ke liye written request deni hogi customer care office mein. ID proof ke saath application submit karein.

question: Can I use data during night hours only?
answer: Kuch special packs hain jo night hours (12 AM - 6 AM) mein extra data dete hain. Yeh add-on packs hain jo main plan ke saath le sakte ho.

question: What is 4G coverage in my area?
answer: 4G coverage check karne ke liye website pe coverage map dekho ya customer care se apne pin code ke liye enquire karein. Most urban areas mein coverage hai.
